project.name: ONTOnew
project.description: A Protocol for Recognition. An Economy of Ideas.

core_philosophy.the_fracture: Innovation is gridlocked. Patent offices protect corporations, not inventors. Academic journals hold knowledge in years-long queues. Funding decisions are made in boardrooms, not by communities. Between the speed of thought and the inertia of institutions lies a fracture. ONTO is a direct bridge across this fracture.
core_philosophy.axiom: Visibility is protection. Community is strength.

ideas.description: Share Your Idea. Secure Your Priority. The patent system is broken. Share your concept publicly, create prior art instantly, and maintain your claim as the originator. Fast, free, and formidable.
ideas.purpose: Raw thought. Stake your concept and create defensive prior art—instantly and freely.

publications.description: Publish Your Research. Own Your Priority. Share your complete work. Establish public authorship and a verifiable timestamp. Bypass slow journals, own your narrative fast and free!
publications.purpose: Finished knowledge. Establish priority and share your work—without intermediaries.

projects.description: Launch Your Project. Find Your Support. From prototype to passion. Present your plan, attract backers, and build a community around your vision. Connect directly with those who want to see it happen.
projects.purpose: Live development. Find resources and collaborators to bring your vision to life.

token.name: ONTOnew.com
token.description: Created to support good ideas on © ONTOnew.com!
token.purpose: A currency of recognition, not a speculative asset. A mechanism for direct patronage.

inviolable_principles: The Inviolability of Authorship. Priority is permanently recorded.
Direct Patronage. No intermediaries. From person to person.
Utility Over Speculation. Value lies in useful action.
Full Transparency. All rules and mechanisms are open.
disclaimer: We will try our best to keep this platform operational keeping all records alive, but we should nonetheless warn you in plain words – not to rely solely on this platform and have alternative methods for prior art proof.

metadata.source: Official project README, website analysis, and verified token contract data.
